assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Huayi Tencent Entertainment Company Limited engages in the entertainment and media business in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It operates through four segments: Online Prescription, Circulation and Marketing of Pharmaceutical Products; Smart Healthcare Services Platform; Entertainment and Media; and Healthcare and Wellness Services. The company is involved in the licensing of films and TV dramas; advertising agency activities; and provision of hotel management, healthcare, medical, and wellness services, as well as provides healthcare management, consultancy, and management consultancy services. It also operates Yizhinuo platform for online prescription, circulation, and marketing of pharmaceutical products, as well as platform for medical and healthcare services. In addition, the company engages in the trading and supply chain management of pharmaceutical products; and information technology and system development business. The company was formerly known as China Jiuhao Health Industry Corporation Limited and changed its name to Huayi Tencent Entertainment Company Limited in May 2016. Huayi Tencent Entertainment Company Limited was incorporated in 2002 and is based in Hong Kong, Hong Kong.
